trans-unit.source: Represents a WMI event query in *WQL* format.
trans-unit.target: 表示 WMI 事件查询中的*WQL*格式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class based on the given query string or event class name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>类基于给定的查询字符串或事件类名称。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The string representing either the entire event query or the name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 表示要查询的整个事件查询或事件类的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object will try to parse the string as a valid event query.
trans-unit.target: 对象将尝试解析为有效的事件查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: If unsuccessful, the parser will assume that the parameter represents an event class name.
trans-unit.target: 如果不成功，分析器将假定该参数表示非事件类名。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class for the specified event class name, with the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>类的指定的事件的类名，使用指定的条件。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 事件类的查询名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class for the specified event class, with the specified latency time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>对于指定的事件类，使用指定的延迟时间的类。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 事件类的查询名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定用于接收此事件可接受的延迟。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在没有显式的事件提供程序的请求，该查询，其中 WMI 需轮询的条件的情况下使用此值。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 此间隔为的最大之前必须传递事件通知可以经过的时间量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class with the specified event class name, condition, and grouping interval.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>类指定的事件的类名、 条件以及分组间隔。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 事件类的查询名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one `aggregate event`, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔从该处 WMI 发送一个`aggregate event`，而不是很多事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class with the specified event class name, polling interval, and condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>类指定的事件的类名、 轮询间隔和条件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 事件类的查询名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定用于接收此事件可接受的延迟。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在没有所请求的查询没有显式的事件提供程序，并且 WMI 需轮询的条件的情况下使用此值。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 此间隔为的最大之前必须传递事件通知可以经过的时间量。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class with the specified event class name, condition, grouping interval, and grouping properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>与所指定的事件的类名、 条件、 分组间隔和分组属性的类。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 事件类的查询名称。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one `aggregate event`, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔从该处 WMI 发送一个`aggregate event`，而不是很多事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件应分组所依据的事件类的属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref> class with the specified event class name, condition, grouping interval, grouping properties, and specified number of events.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Management.WqlEventQuery"></xref>与指定的事件的类名、 条件、 分组间隔、 分组属性和指定的数目的事件的类。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event class on which to be queried.
trans-unit.target: 要查询所依据的事件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定用于接收此事件可接受的延迟。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.
trans-unit.target: 在没有显式的事件提供程序的请求，该查询，其中 WMI 需轮询的条件的情况下使用此值。

trans-unit.source: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.
trans-unit.target: 此间隔为的最大之前必须传递事件通知可以经过的时间量。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: The specified interval at which WMI sends one `aggregate event`, rather than many events.
trans-unit.target: 指定的间隔从该处 WMI 发送一个`aggregate event`，而不是很多事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties in the event class by which the events should be grouped.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件应分组所依据的事件类的属性。

trans-unit.source: The condition to apply to the number of events.
trans-unit.target: 要应用到的事件数的条件。

trans-unit.source: Builds the query string according to the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 生成根据当前的属性值的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 创建对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

trans-unit.source: The copied object.
trans-unit.target: 复制的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于指定的类的事件的条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the condition or conditions in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>值，该值包含条件在事件查询。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置查询的事件类。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的类名称。

trans-unit.source: Property Value A string containing the name of the event class to query.
trans-unit.target: 属性值包含事件类的查询的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the name of the event class in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>事件中包含的事件类的名称值查询。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets properties in the event to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于对同一类型的事件进行分组的事件中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的组合。

trans-unit.source: Property Value Null, if no grouping is required; otherwise, a collection of event property names.
trans-unit.target: 属性值为 Null，如果没有分组是必需的;否则为事件属性名称的集合。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> containing the properties in the event to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref>包含要用于对同一类型的事件进行分组的事件中的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval to be used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于对同一类型的事件进行分组的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Property Value Null, if there is no grouping involved; otherwise, the interval in which WMI should group events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 属性值为 Null，如果没有分组涉及到;否则，哪些 WMI 中的间隔应组相同类型的事件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value containing the interval used for grouping events of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值包含用于对同一类型的事件进行分组的间隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于事件，接收到的事件的数量基于聚合的条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the condition applied to the aggregation of events, based on the number of events received.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>值，该值包含应用于事件，接收到的事件的数量基于聚合的条件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 分析查询字符串，并相应地设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要分析的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the language of the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取查询的语言。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value The value of this property in this object is always "WQL".
trans-unit.target: ##属性值的此对象中的此属性的值始终为"WQL"。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value that contains the query language that the query is written in.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个<xref:System.String>值，其中包含查询将被写入单元的查询语言</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string representing the query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value A string representing the query.
trans-unit.target: ##属性值表示查询的字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>值包含的查询。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在此查询中使用的轮询间隔。

trans-unit.source: This property should only be set in cases where there is no *event provider* for the event requested, and WMI is required to poll for the requested condition.
trans-unit.target: 只应在用例中设置此属性没有任何*事件提供程序*请求的事件，并且 WMI 需轮询请求的条件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性的值将覆盖任何以前的值存储在对象中。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval.
trans-unit.target: 重新生成的查询字符串以反映新的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Property Value Null, if there is no polling involved; otherwise, a valid <xref:System.TimeSpan> value if polling is required.
trans-unit.target: 属性值为 Null，如果没有轮询涉及到;否则为是有效<xref:System.TimeSpan>时轮询是必需的值。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value containing the polling interval used in the event query.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值包含轮询间隔在事件使用查询。</xref:System.TimeSpan>
